description: A moderate G2 geomagnetic storm on June 14 could push auroras as far south as New York and Idaho, triggered by solar wind from a coronal hole. NOAA forecasts peak geomagnetic activity with a Kp index of 5.67. While increased daylight may limit visibility, skywatchers are advised to look out for northern lights during early morning hours.
title: Aurora Alert! Northern Lights May Be Visible as Far South as New York on June 14

description: Coinbase has introduced a crypto credit card in partnership with American Express. A blog post by Coinbase claimed that the card would waive trading fees on the first $500 (roughly Rs. 43,000) earned in trades. Meanwhile, USDC stablecoin holders will be able to gain additional rewards.
title: Coinbase Announces American Express-Backed Crypto Credit Card That Offers Bitcoin Rewards

description: Starring Akshay Kumar, Kesari Chapter 2 is a movie based on the Jallianwala Bagh Massacre. The plot revolves around C. Sankaran Nair, who challenged the British Raj and uncovered shocking truths proving the government’s involvement in the massacre.
title: Kesari Chapter 2 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know About Akshay Kumar Starrer Movie

description: Google is reportedly shutting down Android’s Instant Apps feature later this year. As per the report, the Mountain View-based tech giant is ending support for the feature due to its low usage and adoption among users. These app-like interfaces will reportedly no longer work after December 2025, and the company will also end support for its application programming interface (API).
title: Killed by Google: Support for Android Instant Apps to Reportedly Be Dropped Later This Year

description: Russian scientists have verified the existence of a new island in the northern Caspian Sea, first spotted via satellite in late 2024. Located 30 km from Maly Zhemchuzhny Island, the islet appeared as sea levels reached historic lows due to climate change and tectonic shifts. Although researchers couldn’t land due to shallow water, drone images confirmed the landform’s shape. This new feature may become a key site for ecological studies on how climate and geology reshape inland water bodies like the Caspian Sea.
title: New Island Forms in Caspian Sea as Water Levels Drop, Russian Scientists Confirm

description: Realme GT 7 Dream Edition is now available for sale in India through offline and online channels. It comes with 16 GB of RAM and 512GB of storage and is priced at Rs. 49,999. The Dream Edition has been designed in collaboration with the Aston Martin Aramco Formula One Team and is therefore clad in the Aston Martin Racing Green shade.
title: Realme GT 7 Dream Edition Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Sale Offers

description: SpaceX launched 26 Starlink satellites on June 12 from California, expanding its broadband network beyond 7,600 active units. The mission marked the 72nd Falcon 9 launch of 2025, with 53 supporting Starlink. Booster B1081, reused for the 15th time, landed safely on a droneship, reinforcing SpaceX’s continued dominance in satellite deployment and rocket reusability.
title: SpaceX Launches 26 New Starlink Satellites, Expands Global Internet Network

description: Steam for Mac will soon run natively on Apple Silicon Mac computers. The latest Steam for macOS beta release now allows the main Steam client and its helper app to run natively on M-series Mac models. This transition delivers faster performance and improved memory efficiency, by dropping the use of Apple's Rosetta 2 translation layer.
title: Steam for Mac Now Available as Native Apple Silicon App With Latest Beta Release

description: The Boat Airdopes Prime 701 ANC will launch in India on June 21. They will be the first of the company's Prime series of audio wearables. The TWS earphones are said to feature 10mm dynamic drivers, 24-bit Spatial Audio support and offer a total battery life of up to 50 hours. The Boat Airdopes Prime 701 ANC are expected to come with upgrades over the non-Prime Boat Airdopes 701 ANC TWS earphones.
title: Boat Airdopes Prime 701 ANC Earphones Confirmed to Launch in India on June 21

description: Meta AI app’s Discover feed is reportedly filled with users unknowingly posting their private conversations and requests. Multiple reports have claimed spotting text conversations and image requests that appear to be of a personal nature, leading to the belief that the users are posting them to the artificial intelligence (AI) app’s social feed unknowingly.
title: Meta AI Discovery Feed Is Reportedly Filled With Users' Seemingly Private Chats

description: Vivo X200 FE appears to have surfaced on the Geekbench benchmarking site, suggesting key specifications. A listing with model number V2503, which is said to be the FE variant, suggests that the device runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC. It is shown with 12GB RAM and Android 15. The phone is likely to be launched by by July in India.
title: Vivo X200 FE Specifications Leaked, May Feature MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ Chipset

description: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z3 will launch in India on June 19 at 12pm IST. The neckband-style wireless earphones will be available via Amazon and the official website. They will come in Mambo Midnight and Samba Sunset colourways. A quick charge of 10 minutes is claimed to offer up to 27 hours of continuous playback. More details about the audio wearable will be revealed on the day of the launch.
title: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z3 India Launch Date Set for June 19; Colour Options, Battery Details Revealed

description: With the expected launch of Samsung’s Galaxy Z Fold and Z Flip foldables on the horizon, news about the brand’s upcoming tablets have also started to surface online. While recent leaks of the Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 hinted at the tablet’s battery capacity, a new leak has pointed to fresh Geekbench scores, giving us an idea about its performance and chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Spotted on Geekbench; Suggests SoC Details, Benchmark Scores

description: The Browser Company introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) browser on Wednesday. Called Dia, the new browser comes with an in-built AI chatbot that can fetch information on various tabs and assist users with their queries. The new browser comes eight months after the company announced that it is dropping support for the Arc browser due to difficulties in scaling it to a wider demographic.
title: The Browser Company Unveils Dia, an AI-Powered Browser With In-Built Chatbot

description: Vivo has announced the arrival of the Y400 Pro 5G in India. It is also teasing the new phone through a dedicated landing page on its India website. While the exact launch date of the phone is not confirmed, it is expected to ship with the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset, a 5,500mAh battery, and a 6.77-inch AMOLED screen.
title: Vivo Y400 Pro 5G Will Soon Make Its Way to the Indian Market, Rear Design Teased

description: Blaupunkt QLED Google TVs have been launched in India. They are powered by the Android TV OS and feature QLED screens with up to 4K resolution. Blaupunkt's new TV lineup comes in varied screen sizes, ranging from 32-inch to 65-inch. The TVs come with HDR10 and Wide Colour Gamut technologies. They are complemented by Dolby Atmos and Dolby Digital Plus certifications for audio.
title: Blaupunkt Launches 2025 Lineup of QLED Google TVs in India: Price, Specifications

description: Razer Kishi V3 series of mobile gaming controllers was launched on Thursday, and the new Razer Kishi V3, Kishi V3 Pro, and Kishi V3 Pro XL are compatible with iOS, Android devices and PCs. The Kishi V3 Pro XL can support larger devices, including 13-inch iPads and Android tablets, if they feature a USB Type-C port.
title: Razer Kishi V3, Kishi V3 Pro and Kishi V3 Pro XL Mobile Gaming Controllers With Sensa HD Haptics Launched

description: AMD CEO Lisa Su introduced a new Artificial Intelligence (AI) server slated for release in 2026, positioning it as a direct competitor to Nvidia’s top-tier products. The announcement came as OpenAI’s CEO confirmed that the ChatGPT developer will incorporate AMD’s newest chips. Su was joined onstage by OpenAI's Sam Altman.
title: AMD Unveils AI Server as OpenAI Taps Its Newest Chips

description: The overall crypto market cap dipped by 4.14 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered losses on Friday, June 13. Market analysts highlighted that the other cryptos within the top 10 list are also facing a similar pullback, which suggests the correction could persist for a few more days.
title: Bitcoin Falls to $104,300, Most Altcoins See Losses Amid Israel-Iran Tensions

description: BSNL will install one lakh additional 4G towers in India, following upon the successful deployment of one lakh towers earlier this month. It aims to expand upon its 4G infrastructure which is currently undergoing optimisation to fix issues. Further, it is also inviting public suggestions for naming its 5G services before it commences trial.
title: BSNL to Reportedly Install One Lakh Additional 4G Towers Across India; Invites Public to Pitch Name for 5G Services

description: Nearly all the iPhones exported by Foxconn from India went to the United States between March and May. The numbers show Apple has realigned its India exports to almost exclusively serve the US market, when previously the devices were more widely distributed to countries including the Netherlands, the Czech Republic and Britain.
title: Foxconn Sends 97 Percent of India iPhone Exports to US as Apple Tackles Tariffs

description: Google DeepMind announced the launch of Weather Lab, an interactive website which is powered by artificial intelligence (AI) weather models. Available as a public preview, the website also includes the company’s latest AI-based cyclone model that can predict both the cyclone track (or path) as well as its intensity, up to 15 days in advance.
title: Google Launches AI-Powered Weather Lab, Releases Experimental AI Cyclone Model

description: Google's Pixel 10 series is tipped to support Qi 2 wireless charging, but the lineup could need a case to enable wireless charging with the rumoured Pixelsnap accessories. Instead of attaching the magnets in the phones, the company will reportedly include Qi 2 magnets in its own cases. Additionally, Google could launch a dual-port USB Type-C charger.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series to Lack In-Built Magnets Despite Offering Qi 2 Support: Report

description: Google said on Thursday it had resolved a brief global service disruption on its platforms that affected multiple services such as music streamer Spotify and instant messaging provider Discord. The outage disrupted services on platforms such as Spotify, Snapchat and Discord that rely on the tech giant's cloud managed services and infrastructure.
title: Google Resolves Global Service Outage Impacting Multiple Platforms

description: Google's latest update for the Snapseed app on iPhone and iPad brings several new changes. It introduces a fresh user interface with a new Faves tab, a simplified icon, and a new arc-style controller for adjusting the image properties. Users can also apply new film filters, inspired by classic film rolls, to images.
title: Google Updates Snapseed for iPhone and iPad With Faves Tab, Film Filters and More

description: HP’s Omen Max 16 is a powerful gaming laptop that comes with the Nvidia GeForce RTX 5080 Laptop GPU and an Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX CPU. It has a 16-inch WQXGA IPS display and a stealthy design with minimal RGB lighting. Do the hardware upgrades make it a good choice for serious gamers? Read the review to find out.
title: HP Omen Max 16 Review: A Good Omen for Gamers

description: Apple is improving parental controls with its upcoming iOS 26 update. Upcoming improvements include a streamlined Child Account setup, more granular App Store age ratings, and the option for parents to share a child's age range with apps for age-appropriate content. Parents will also be able to use Communication Limits to approve new contacts on Messages and third-party apps.
title: iOS 26 to Improve Child Account Setup Process, Will Allow Parents to Share Child's Age Range With Apps

description: Lava has expanded the Storm 5G lineup in India with the Storm Play 5G and Storm Lite 5G variants. The phones are powered by MediaTek's Dimensity 7060 and Dimensity 6400 SoCs, respectively. Both handsets come with 5,000mAh batteries, IP64-rated builds, and 50-megapixel main rear cameras. The Storm Play 5G and Storm Lite 5G will be available for purchase in the country via Amazon later this month.
title: Lava Storm Play 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 7060 SoC Launched in India Alongside Storm Lite 5G

description: Microsoft announced the expansion of Copilot Vision with Highlights to Windows on Wednesday. Initially, the new artificial intelligence (AI) feature will only be available in the US, but the company plans to release it in other regions soon. It uses computer vision and tool use to analyse the content on the user’s screen and assist them with queries.
title: Microsoft Expands Copilot Vision With Highlights on Windows, Can Work With Two Apps Simultaneously

description: Microsoft has reportedly cancelled its own Xbox handheld console, days after Asus unveiled its ROG Xbox Ally. The company will now focus on developing its new Xbox software platform, instead of launching a Nintendo Switch competitor. The Asus ROG Xbox Ally could be the first of many handheld consoles to arrive with Microsoft's improved software platform.
title: Microsoft's Xbox Handheld Console 'Essentially Canceled', Company to Work on Xbox Software Platform: Report

description: Nothing Phone 3 and Headphone 1 will launch in the US and Canada, according to a report citing Nothing CEO Carl Pei. They will be available via Amazon and Best Buy, respectively, as well as the official website, the report noted. Pei added that the UK-based OEM is aiming to scale strategically in North American markets. The Nothing Phone 3 and Headphone 1 are set to launch on July 1.
title: Nothing Phone 3, Headphone 1 to Be Reportedly Sold in the US and Canada

description: Alleged renders of the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8, Galaxy Watch 8 Classic, and Galaxy Watch Ultra 2025 have surfaced online suggesting a new "squircle" design. Samsung debuted this design last year with the Galaxy Watch Ultra. The vanilla model is seen in a white colour option, while the Galaxy Watch 8 Classic and new Ultra models appear in black and blue shades, respectively.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8, Galaxy Watch 8 Classic, Galaxy Watch Ultra Renders Leaked: Suggests Squircle Design

description: Vivo T4 5G will likely launch in India by the end of June, according to a recent report. It could cost around Rs. 10,000 and is expected to house a 6,000mAh battery. The handset will likely be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC and boast an "ultra-slim" build. The report claimed that the Vivo T4 Pro variant may also join the T4 series in the country soon.
title: Vivo T4 Lite 5G Price in India, Launch Timeline Leaked; Said to Pack 6,000mAh Battery

description: Vivo will launch the X Fold 5 on June 25 in China. Ahead of the launch, the brand has announced that the foldable phone will ship with a 6,000mAh battery. It is teased to come with a periscope telephoto camera. The X Fold 5 is currently up for pre-orders in China via the Vivo online store and e-commerce websites.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 Confirmed to Pack 6,000mAh Battery; to Get Periscope Telephoto Camera

description: Yahoo is rolling out new AI features for its email platform. A new gamified “Catch Up” feature will provide AI-powered summaries and email previews to give users the option to “delete” or “keep in inbox.”
title: Yahoo Adds New AI Features to Mail App in Attempt to Up Usage

description: Oppo K13x 5G is expected to launch in India by the end of June. The handset will come with an IP65-rated dust and water-resistant build. The company says it has used a sea sponge-inspired Sponge Biomimetic Shock Absorption System to make the phone. It will also carry SGS Gold Drop-Resistance, SGS Military Standard and MIL-STD 810-H shock resistance certifications.
title: Oppo K13x 5G Build, Durability Details Revealed Ahead of Anticipated India Launch

description: Apple is said to have internally set a launch date for the rollout of advanced Siri. According to a report, the feature, which was first previewed at WWDC 2024 last year, could finally be released in Spring 2026. If the development remains on schedule, the company could tease the AI capabilities alongside the launch of the purported iPhone 17 series in September this year.
title: Apple to Release Advanced Siri for iPhone With iOS 26.4 Update in Spring 2026: Report

description: Instagram will soon let users re-order their feed for better control over the content, the company announced on Thursday. It will also let them post photos and videos without broadcasting it to everyone's feed. The social media platform also announced a new feature which lets users share currently playing Spotify tracks in Notes, alongside a partnership with Catalan artist Rosalia.
title: Instagram Will Soon Let You Re-Order Your Feed, Post Without Broadcasting to Everyone
